configurationUpdate.merge: {"logsUploaderConfiguration": {"systemLogsConfiguration": {"uploadToCloudWatch": true, "minimumLogLevel": "ERROR", "diskSpaceLimit": 10, "diskSpaceLimitUnit": "MB", "deleteLogFileAfterCloudUpload": false}, "componentLogsConfigurationMap": {"com.prmeng.SentinelVision": {"minimumLogLevel": "ERROR", "diskSpaceLimit": 20, "diskSpaceLimitUnit": "MB", "deleteLogFileAfterCloudUpload": false}, "aws.greengrass.SecureTunneling": {"minimumLogLevel": "ERROR", "diskSpaceLimit": 20, "diskSpaceLimitUnit": "MB", "deleteLogFileAfterCloudUpload": false}, "aws.greengrass.Nucleus": {"minimumLogLevel": "ERROR", "diskSpaceLimit": 20, "diskSpaceLimitUnit": "MB", "deleteLogFileAfterCloudUpload": false}}, "periodicUploadIntervalSec": 300, "deprecatedVersionSupport": false, "pythonVersion": "3.7"}}}
